QuestData.Title: To the Skies!
QuestData.Description:
We can use the pterrorwing that you found to strike a decisive blow against the mogu.
Their mining operation is vulnerable to attack from the air, and your pterrorwing is the only beast we have capable of flying out there.
Let me know when you are ready!
QuestData.LogDescription: Gain access to the Lightning Vein Mine.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Lor'themar Theron to begin your mission
